t: The Problem with Selling on Handmade at Amazon
s: January 21, 2020 - Brand customers have some degree of loyalty, seeking out specific goods in the marketplace. These customers are less likely to substitute products based on price and availability. And they’re precisely the kind of shoppers that handmade artisans need to sustain their business.
